subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jim Leyland was the only Tiger tilted toward the Yankees’ dugout when the starting lineup was announced before Tuesday night’s game. He lamented that he could not find a reason to detest the Yankees.
snippet: Jim Leyland was the only Tiger tilted toward the Yankees’ dugout when the starting lineup was announced before Tuesday night’s game. He lamented that he could not find a reason to detest the Yankees.
